summary: Unmanned aerial vehicles, or drones, are aircraft without pilots on board. They were first made for risky military tasks but have now become crucial for many armies. With advancements in technology and lower costs, drones are used for various tasks. These include taking photos, monitoring crops, checking hard-to-reach areas, and even delivering goods. Drones can be controlled and used for fun, too. They come in different shapes, like fixed-wing and rotorcraft, and carry different tools for specific jobs.
title: Unmanned aerial vehicle
